title: Cultural season font
content:
Hello everyone!

I'm currently designing a brochure for a cultural season. The brochure cover/poster is based on a photography (rather classical atmosphere), and I'm looking for a font to set the title of the season. I might be using a shape in the back to support it (maybe a round shape). Do you have any ideas of modern sans serif fonts I could use? Commercial fonts sugegstions are welcome, I have a budget for that. I'm looking for something modern, new, distinctive, appealing.

Thanks for your suggestions!  
Hed
author: MountainGirl
